meanings.definition: Members of the lowest and most degraded class of workers.
meanings.sent1: The lumpenproletariats struggled to find stable employment.
meanings.sent2: In the city, the lumpenproletariats often lived in impoverished neighborhoods.
meanings.sent3: The lumpenproletariats decided to start a band, but none of them could play an instrument.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned factory was filled with lumpenproletariats seeking shelter.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lumpenproletariats scavenging for food was heartbreaking.

meanings.definition: People who are considered to be unproductive and of no value to society.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy businessman viewed the homeless as lumpenproletariats.
meanings.sent2: Some individuals unfairly label the unemployed as lumpenproletariats.
meanings.sent3: The lumpenproletariats were invited to a charity event as the guests of honor.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the elite, the artists were seen as lumpenproletariats.
meanings.sent5: The novel depicted a future society where everyone was deemed lumpenproletariats.
